markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Invisibility](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2790)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=629" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 226 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto light armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Light seems to partially penetrate this armor. 

**Activate—Go Invisible** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** With a thought, you become invisible for 1 minute, gaining the effects of a 2nd-rank [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) spell.

**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Invisibility
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 226 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 583 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Invisibility (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 226 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 583 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 1,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You can activate the armor up to three times per day.
name: Invisibility (Greater)
